meanings.definition: The process of removing chlorine from a substance.
meanings.sent1: The dechlorination of water ensures it is safe to drink.
meanings.sent2: The dechlorination of the pool water made it less harsh on the skin.
meanings.sent3: The dechlorination party was a hit among the environmentally conscious guests.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the dechlorination process, removing any trace of negativity.
meanings.sent5: The dechlorination of the soil was crucial for the health of the plants.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing the amount of chlorine in a material.
meanings.sent1: Regular dechlorination of the tank keeps the fish healthy.
meanings.sent2: The dechlorination of the fabric prevented it from discoloration.
meanings.sent3: The dechlorination challenge was to see who could purify the water fastest.
meanings.sent4: His dechlorination efforts in the pool saved many swimmers from irritated eyes.
meanings.sent5: The dechlorination of the air was necessary to create a safe environment for the workers.
